scenes.description: Gigi Murin, Nerissa Ravencroft, and Mori Calliope perform the song 'Rouge' (ロウワー).
A domestic life roleplay skit where Gigi and Nerissa play a married couple while Calli cooks in the background.

subtitles.original: 止まらないで またタップダンス
subtitles.english: Don't stop, tap dance again.

subtitles.original: 亡く身失うまで 逆転劇を繰る
subtitles.english: Until our bodies are lost, play out the reversal drama.

subtitles.original: 舌が乾いた心にも 吐き出すように込めて
subtitles.english: Pour it into the heart with a dry tongue as if spitting it out.

subtitles.original: 胸の中 香りのように濁る
subtitles.english: Inside my chest, it grows cloudy like a scent.

subtitles.original: 受け止めた一言が自分さえ
subtitles.english: Even the single word I accepted...

subtitles.original: 抱えられず持て余した それを守っている
subtitles.english: ...I couldn't handle it, yet I'm protecting it.

subtitles.original: 掠れた声は空々しく 喉は焼けて埋め尽くす
subtitles.english: The raspy voice is hollow, and my throat is burning and filled.

subtitles.original: 何を言うべきか 分からなくて
subtitles.english: I don't know what to say.

subtitles.original: 感じてたものが 今解き放たれていた
subtitles.english: What I was feeling has now been released.

subtitles.original: 同じ様に違う なんだか違う
subtitles.english: It's the same, yet different. Somehow, it's different.

subtitles.original: いつまで行こうか 何処まで行けるのか
subtitles.english: How long shall we go? How far can we go?

subtitles.original: 左様かじゃないなら 何を思うの
subtitles.english: If it's not "is that so," then what are you thinking?

subtitles.original: 僕らが離れるのなら
subtitles.english: If we are to part...

subtitles.original: 僕らが望むのなら
subtitles.english: ...if that's what we desire...

subtitles.original: その度に何回も 繋がれるように
subtitles.english: ...then so that we can be connected many times over.

subtitles.original: ここに引き留めるのなら
subtitles.english: If I'm to keep you here...

subtitles.original: 離さず居られるのなら
subtitles.english: ...if I can stay without letting go...

subtitles.original: まだ誰も知らない 感覚ですら割れていく
subtitles.english: ...then even sensations no one knows yet will split apart.

subtitles.original: ナルナルノ
subtitles.english: Naru naru no

subtitles.original: ラルラルタ
subtitles.english: Laru laru ta

subtitles.original: ラルラルタ
subtitles.english: Laru laru ta

subtitles.original: ラルラルタ
subtitles.english: Laru laru ta

subtitles.original: いつまで続くだろうと
subtitles.english: I wonder how long it will last...

subtitles.original: 同じ様に同じ様に呟く
subtitles.english: ...I murmur in the same way, in the same way.

subtitles.original: 今は忘れないよう 刻まれた空気を
subtitles.english: Right now, so I don't forget, the atmosphere carved here...

subtitles.original: これから何度も 思い出すのだろう
subtitles.english: ...I'll probably remember it many times from now on.

subtitles.original: 僕らだけだ
subtitles.english: It's just us.

subtitles.original: 僕らが離れるのなら
subtitles.english: If we are to part...

subtitles.original: 僕らが望むのなら
subtitles.english: ...if that's what we desire...

subtitles.original: その度に何回も 繋がれるように
subtitles.english: ...then so that we can be connected many times over.

subtitles.original: ここに引き留めるのなら
subtitles.english: If I'm to keep you here...

subtitles.original: 離さず居られるのなら
subtitles.english: ...if I can stay without letting go...

subtitles.original: まだ誰も知らない 感覚僕の
subtitles.english: ...even my sensations that no one knows yet...

subtitles.original: 生きてる姿を
subtitles.english: ...my living form...

subtitles.original: 確かめて正しくして
subtitles.english: ...confirm it and make it right.

subtitles.original: Oh husband, I'm so happy to be living a domestic life with you Gigi Murin...
subtitles.english: Oh husband, I'm so happy to be living a domestic life with you Gigi Murin...

subtitles.original: ...well, in your awesome house, with your awesome kitchen...
subtitles.english: ...well, in your awesome house, with your awesome kitchen...

subtitles.original: ...and your awesome floor, and this awesome couch.
subtitles.english: ...and your awesome floor, and this awesome couch.

subtitles.original: Wife.
subtitles.english: Wife.

subtitles.original: Husband.
subtitles.english: Husband.

subtitles.original: I've never been married before.
subtitles.english: I've never been married before.

subtitles.original: Me neither.
subtitles.english: Me neither.

subtitles.original: What am I supposed to do?
subtitles.english: What am I supposed to do?

subtitles.original: How am I supposed to take care of you?
subtitles.english: How am I supposed to take care of you?

subtitles.original: Take care of me?
subtitles.english: Take care of me?

subtitles.original: You're so sweet, no one's ever wanted to do that.
subtitles.english: You're so sweet, no one's ever wanted to do that.

subtitles.original: I want to take care of you.
subtitles.english: I want to take care of you.

subtitles.original: Oh! I've dreamed of this forever...
subtitles.english: Oh! I've dreamed of this forever...

subtitles.original: ...and ever...
subtitles.english: ...and ever...

subtitles.original: ...and ever...
subtitles.english: ...and ever...

subtitles.original: ...and ever...
subtitles.english: ...and ever...

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness!
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness!

subtitles.original: Oh! Gigi Murin!
subtitles.english: Oh! Gigi Murin!

subtitles.original: Please, not in front of...
subtitles.english: Please, not in front of...

subtitles.original: ...not in front of the studio audience!
subtitles.english: ...not in front of the studio audience!

subtitles.original: Oh, my beautiful, beautiful wife.
subtitles.english: Oh, my beautiful, beautiful wife.

subtitles.original: How far does your leg go up?
subtitles.english: How far does your leg go up?

subtitles.original: Oh! As far as you want it to!
subtitles.english: Oh! As far as you want it to!

subtitles.original: I see. That's enough.
subtitles.english: I see. That's enough.

subtitles.original: Oh, not in front of the studio audience.
subtitles.english: Oh, not in front of the studio audience.

subtitles.original: Not in front of the studio audience.
subtitles.english: Not in front of the studio audience.

subtitles.original: I can't believe you did that.
subtitles.english: I can't believe you did that.

subtitles.original: Me?
subtitles.english: Me?

subtitles.original: If you say so husband, I can't believe I'm such a dirty dirty girl...
subtitles.english: If you say so husband, I can't believe I'm such a dirty dirty girl...

subtitles.original: ...in front of this audience and everything.
subtitles.english: ...in front of this audience and everything.

subtitles.original: That's only for me, my dirty dirty girl.
subtitles.english: That's only for me, my dirty dirty girl.

subtitles.original: Yes, I wouldn't want anyone else to see me like that but you.
subtitles.english: Yes, I wouldn't want anyone else to see me like that but you.

subtitles.original: I should do something for you.
subtitles.english: I should do something for you.

subtitles.original: That is what a Gigi Murin should do.
subtitles.english: That is what a Gigi Murin should do.

subtitles.original: Yes, I would love that.
subtitles.english: Yes, I would love that.

subtitles.original: I should make you some toast.
subtitles.english: I should make you some toast.

subtitles.original: Some toast for me?
subtitles.english: Some toast for me?

subtitles.original: Yes, for you!
subtitles.english: Yes, for you!

subtitles.original: You're so sweet.
subtitles.english: You're so sweet.

subtitles.original: Have you ever cooked before?
subtitles.english: Have you ever cooked before?
